title: Woman injured in accidental shooting inside vehicle
content:
A woman was injured Monday after police say a gun accidentally went off in her vehicle.
Police received a call about 2:20 p.m. for a report of a person being shot while driving north in the 2100 block Division Street.
The woman, who was driving, was treated at a local hospital for non-life-threatening injuries.
A handgun was found inside the vehicle. The preliminary investigation indicates there was an accidental discharge inside the vehicle, Capt. Brent Biggs said in a news release. The investigation is ongoing.
